title: Bank of England Publishes Plans to Regulate Wide-Use Stablecoins
description: The U.K. government published plans for regulating crypto last week.

title: SOL Drops 5% as FTX Estate Transfers Tokens to Binance, Kraken
description: The $30 million transfer takes the total SOL moved to exchanges to $102 million, the most out of any liquid asset, while the token's price is near the highest in a year.

title: Bankrupt FTX wants to liquidate $744 million in assets from Grayscale and Bitwise
description:
Bankrupt cryptocurrency exchange FTX has expressed readiness to sell $744 million worth of its Trust assets held at Grayscale and Bitwise, according to a Nov. 3 court filing. The Trust assets consist of various exchange-traded products managed by Grayscale, including its Bitcoin and Ethereum Trusts and Bitwise’s 10 Crypto index fund. The filing shows that […]

The post Bankrupt FTX wants to liquidate $744 million in assets from Grayscale and Bitwise appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Ethereum (ETH) Price Analysis: Can ETH Price Break Past $2000
description: The Ethereum (ETH) price has moved above the $1850 mark and is currently trading at the $1880 mark, and could push toward the resistance at $2000. Currently, ETH is above the $1850 price level and the 100-hourly Simple Moving Average.

title: BREAKING: Hong Kong’s Regulatory Shift Sets Stage for Spot Crypto ETFs Approval for Retail Investors
description: Hong Kong’s Securities and Futures Commission (SFC) is advancing towards granting retail investors the ability to invest in spot crypto Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs). A progressive shift in policy reflects the regulators’ evolving stance towards cryptocurrency investment for the general public, moving away from earlier restrictions. In a pivotal regulatory update that’s stirring up the [...]

title: Twitter Sleuth Alleges Chinese Control in the Ethereum Network
description:
Truth Labs, a crypto investigator popular on X, has alleged that the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) wields overarching influence in the Ethereum network through entities it controls. The investigator has sounded alarm that the decentralized future of Ethereum is under threat. It alleged that Chinese entities close to CCP held nearly 80% of ETH mined […]

The post Twitter Sleuth Alleges Chinese Control in the Ethereum Network appeared first on Coin Edition.
